racial_modifiers: +4 Acrobatics when jumping, +4 Survival to find food
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Monsters/New Familiars/Small and Vermin Familiars/Familiar/Goat

sections.body: Goats eat almost anything that can be digested, and are determined in their pursuit of tempting foodstuffs such as leather armor and rope. They can provide milk and wool.

name: Familiar, Goat
skills: Acrobatics +1 (+5 when jumping), Climb +5, Survival +0 (+4 to find food)
